Events that occurred on 13 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 13.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 145.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 256.
1977 - Tom Shippey reviews J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography in The Times Literary Supplement.
